name: BunnyHop (FaresMQ)
description:
MADE FOR GDB JUICE JAM 2 :https://itch.io/jam/gdb-juice-jam-ii

A cute and innocent bunny has been ordered to go on a mission to collect three coins to pay for his crimes.

In this game you hop around in a floaty world with juicy controls to try to find the three coins.

HOW TO PLAY:

D: move right.

A: move left.

Hold space to fill your jump meter and let go to jump.

E: to empty your jump meter.

R: to restart level.

Esc: to go back to menu.

Move around the level and collect 3 coins then go back to the start.

Enjoy and please tell me if you find any bugs.

:)
